title: [Unturned 3.14.10.0] 更新记录
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-3-25 22:35 编辑 

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/news/?appids=304930
Unturned Forum: http://unturned-forum.com/threads/3-14-10-0-update-notes.5343/
3.14.10.0 Rocket: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-543521-1-1.html


Additions/添加
Added new item context menu and quick refill/repair/salvage actions. 物品副级菜单增加补充弹药/修复/回收功能.Added inventory menu to see nearby items making looting corpses/piles easier. 背包新增“nearby”界面，可显示角色附近的物品.Added ability to quickly take item from display/rack. [Default Ctrl + F] 新增快速拾取物品功能.[默认是 Ctrl + F]Added in-game item/vehicle rarity colors. 新增物品/载具稀有度颜色.Added decay and rain commands to the config menu. 新增decay（腐蚀） 和 rain（下雨）指令到配置界面.Added button to unfavorite servers from the server list. 服务器列表增加unfavorite（不喜欢/取消收藏）按钮.Added option to disable day/night ambience.增加关闭day（早上）/night（夜晚）的环境效果.
Improvements/优化
Improved memory management/usage significantly on client and server. 显著优化客户端和服务端内存管理/使用.Improved hotkeys to requip, work on any page and save per server/character. 优化快速装备装备快捷键，可在任何界面使用以及将服务器/角色保存.Improved inventory to split storage and nearby into a separate area on large screens. 优化背包储存界面，分裂后增加nearby（附近物品）大型储存界面.Improved crafting menu to show the skill level and fire required. 优化crafting（制作）界面现在会显示制作所需职业技能等级.Improved give/vehicle/teleport/experience commands to not require the player parameter. 优化give（给予）/vehicle（载具）/teleport（传送）/experience（经验值）指令无需输入玩家名.Improved help [command] to also work as client and in singleplayer. 优化help（帮助）指令可在客户端（单人游戏）执行.Improved item networking to support more items in one area. 优化item networking（暂且翻译为区域物品管理）支持更多的物品同存与一个区域.Improved world hints not to show behind the dashboard. 优化世界提示不会显示在信息界面后面.Improved item/vehicle networking to use new instance IDs instead of indices. 雅虎item/vehicle networking（暂且翻译为区域物品/载具管理）会使用新的IDs而不是indices（旧式）. Improved zombie/animal/vehicle state updates to use basic position compression. 优化zombie（僵尸）/animal（动物）/vehicle（载具）状态会根据基础定位更新.Improved buildable intersection displacement to better avoid forcing into objects. 优化buildable intersection displacement（可摆放物品交叉口移位-优化位置）可以更好的控制物品不强行与其他物品碰撞.Improved on some physics issues with objects/resources.优化一些objects（物品）/resources（资源）的物理问题.
Tweaks/调整
Tweaked dropped items to appear in front of character. 调整掉落/丢弃/扔出的物品会在角色面部扔出.Tweaked handcuffs to prevent getting in vehicles as driver. 调整手铐放置取代车主的身份.Tweaked blueprint title text to change color when you can craft. 调整可制作时提示语会自动转换颜色.Tweaked farming speed of agriculture skill lower. 调慢agriculture skill（农民职业）的耕作速度.Tweaked debug UI to show seconds since last packet received. 调整debug UI（debug界面）显示最后几秒收到的packet（这里可以理解为数据）.Tweaked orientation of items in trophy cases. 在trophy cases（展示柜）内调整物品方向.Tweaked different skills to require different amounts of XP per level. 调整不同的职业技能需要不同数量的经验值.Tweaked several hollow objects to contain death barriers just in case. 调整一些空心的物品.Removed "new survivor" default names.移除“new survivor" 默认名称.
Fixes/修复
Fixed placing buildables near player spawns. 修复可在重新玩家点摆放可摆放物品.（好绕...）Fixed default easy/hard armor multipliers backwards. 修复默认easy/hard 护甲值会在后面成倍增加.Fixed birch/pine trophy case using maple sticks. 修复 birch（桦木）/pine（松木）展示柜使用枫木木棍.Fixed regen health immediately after damage. 修复收到伤害后立刻开始回血.Fixed not showing amount in hint with one remaining item. 修复提示提示物品数量时不显示.Fixed despawn label typo. 修复typo标签自动消失.Fixed not immediately removing admin visual when unadmined. 修复取消管理时不立刻取消管理员界面.Fixed crafting pitchfork. 修复制作pitchfork（草叉）.Fixed not taking into account 2nd border in map UI. 修复地图 UI（界面）不会显示第二条边界.Fixed tooltips showing up underneath inventory selection/drag. 修复物品提示会显示在背包selection（选择）/drag（拖拽）下面.Fixed override glasses mythic hook point.修复眼镜会覆盖mythic hook point（没明白）.
Item Asset Upgrades（更新物品优点）: 
You can now use rich text in your item descriptions, and add more context actions. 你现在可以修改物品，给它添加更多的变量，完善/优化它的介绍.
Right now blueprint actions are supported in the following format: 
目前支持以下格式:

Actions 1 
Action_0_Type Blueprint 
Action_0_Blueprints 1 
Action_0_Blueprint_0 [页数] 
Action_0_Blueprint_0_Link [需要添加连接.] 
Action_0_Text [按钮名称] 
Action_0_Tooltip [按钮提示] 
Action_0_Key [如果没有翻译/名称/提示的话请使用 key e.g. Repair] 

如果没有设置的话，系统会自动添加 repairing（修复）, refilling（补充弹药） 和 salvaging（回收）功能.
